trans-unit.source: Provides a description of modifications done to entities by operations returned in a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una descrizione delle modifiche apportate alle entità tramite le operazioni restituite un <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> object that contains a series of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse> objects, each of which contains a sequence of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor> or LinkDescriptor instances that represent persisted changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>metodo restituisce un <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>oggetto che contiene una serie di <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse>oggetti, ognuno dei quali contiene una sequenza di <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor>o LinkDescriptor istanze che rappresentano modifiche persistenti.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: For successful operations, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> property of the descriptor is set to unchanged and the new values for insert and update operations are merged according to the merge settings.
trans-unit.target: Per le operazioni riuscite, il <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>proprietà del descrittore viene impostata su unchanged e i nuovi valori per l'inserimento e le operazioni di aggiornamento vengono unite in base alle impostazioni di merge.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: For operations with errors, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> of the descriptor will remain the same as they were before <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> was called.
trans-unit.target: Per le operazioni con errori, il <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>del descrittore rimarrà uguale come avveniva prima <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>è stato chiamato.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurred and processing stopped during an operation, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> will remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se si è verificato un errore e l'elaborazione è stata arrestata durante un'operazione, il <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>rimarrà invariata.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: A source entity in a link returned by a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Entità di origine in un collegamento restituito da un <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The identifier property of the source entity in a link returned by a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Proprietà dell'identificatore dell'entità di origine in un collegamento restituito da un <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The string identifier of an identity property in a source entity.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore di stringa di una proprietà identity in un'entità di origine.

trans-unit.source: The source entity in a link returned by a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Entità di origine in un collegamento restituito da un <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"> </xref>.
